actionData.title: Juz 7
actionData.message:
He is the One Who created the heavens and the earth in truth. On the Day ˹of Judgment˺ He will say, ‘Be!’ And there will be! His command is truth. All authority is His ˹alone˺1 on the Day the Trumpet will be blown.2 He is the Knower of all—seen or unseen. And He is the All-Wise, All-Aware.”. 

 Al-Anam:73

actionData.title: Hajj Season
actionData.message: The pilgrimage is underway. Remember the pilgrims in your duas for their safe journey and accepted Hajj.

actionData.title: Eid ul-Fitr Mubarak
actionData.message: A blessed time for celebration after the month of fasting. Enjoy the festivities!

actionData.title: Eid ul-Adha Mubarak
actionData.message: A day to remember the sacrifice and complete the rituals of Hajj. Wishing you a blessed Eid.

actionData.title: Day of Arafah
actionData.message: The peak of Hajj is the Day of Arafah. A day of immense mercy and forgiveness. Don't forget your extra fasting and worship.

actionData.title: 1st Muharram
actionData.message: Happy Hijri New Year! Start the year with renewed intentions and increased good deeds.

actionData.title: Milad-un-Nabi
actionData.message: Sending blessings and peace upon the Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) on this blessed occasion.
